amendment.description: Amendment broadens Federal jurisdiction over repeat offenders of rape or other serious sexual assault and requires life sentences without the possibility of parole upon the second conviction of rape or other sexual assault.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase federal jurisdiction over repeat offenders of rape or serious sexual assault. The amendment would mandate life imprisonment without the possibility of parole upon the second conviction of such a crime.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Slaughter amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 411 - 4 (Roll no. 146).
